mapper.update: UPDATE tb_chat_room SET chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} WHERE chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.chat_room_id, b.user_id, a.created_at, d.username FROM ( SELECT a.chat_room_id, b.user_id, a.created_at FROM tb_chat_room a JOIN tb_chat_room_user b ON a.chat_room_id = b.chat_room_id AND b.user_id = #{userId}) AS a JOIN tb_chat_room_user AS b ON a.chat_room_id = b.chat_room_id AND b.user_id != a.user_id JOIN tb_chat AS c ON a.chat_room_id = c.chat_room_id AND a.user_id = c.user_id AND c.context is null JOIN tb_user AS d ON b.user_id = d.user_id ORDER BY a.created_at desc;

SELECT CASE WHEN a.chat_room_id IS NOT NULL THEN a.chat_room_id ELSE 0 END AS chat_room_id FROM ( SELECT a.chat_room_id, count(a.chat_room_id) as count FROM tb_chat_room as a LEFT JOIN tb_chat_room_user as b ON a.chat_room_id = b.chat_room_id WHERE b.user_id IN (#{userId1}, #{userId2}) GROUP BY a.chat_room_id) as a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT '' ) AS b ON a.count = 2;
